general: Today, Libra, it is essential to make choices that suit you, rather than based on the expectations of others. The Moon in Taurus forms aspects with the nodes of fate, Mercury, and Venus, highlighting the importance of establishing routines that promote your overall well-being. Although you may face resistance from those close to you, do not let their opinions influence you. You will discover the intense power of love as Neptune enters Aries. The next fourteen years will be tinged with romance, fantasies, and sometimes confusion in your relationships. Keep in mind who you are throughout this journey. Tonight, when the Moon aligns with Jupiter, focus on setting healthy boundaries.
love: Stay true to yourself in your relationships, even if it requires setting boundaries.
work: Establish work routines that support your personal balance and avoid negative influences.
health: Prioritize your mental and physical health by adopting habits that nourish you.
